Lines: 6 Message-ID: 3405a5f4.92436695@NEWS.JUMPNET.COM> NNTP-Posting-Host: 207.8.38.226 X-Newsreader: Forte Free Agent 1.1/32.230 Xref: cs.utexas.edu austin.jobs:119845
i:doc.i:body: The computer and photo industries have merged into CompuImage "where photos & computers meet". This exciting concept holds tremendous growth opportunitines. We are looking for a customer friendly person expienced with the Internet, Networking, Windows 95, Windows NT, Foxpro, general troubleshooting and product titles. Call Clifford @ 451-2489 or E-mail cliff@compu-image.com.
